successes.title: Kossel Clear - Let's build a full sized delta 3D printer!
successes.description: An easy to assemble, functional yet aesthetic, cost-effective delta 3D printer for 3D printer fans!

Pledges.description: Our sincere gratitude and your name displayed as a backer on BlueEagleLabs.com!
Blue Eagle Labs Mug - Building till the wee hours of the morning? Use our coffee mugs to keep you fueled all day and all night long! Free shipping within the U.S.
Blue Eagle Labs Shirt - Show them how it's done! Strut in your nerdhood, and express your geekdom with our Blue Eagle Labs shirts! Free shipping within the U.S.
Blue Eagle Labs Spool Holder - Organize your printing station with our spool holder! It will support up to three 8 inches diameter spools. Free shipping within the U.S.
Your choice of PLA or ABS (color selection to follow) 1.75 mm diameter filament. These are pro series filament that are designed to produce the best prints possible with your Kossel Clear.

Mechanical Kit:  Includes frame, belts, pulleys, end stops, power switch, aluminum extrusions, acrylic parts, fasteners (will need stepper motors, power supply, controllers, wiring, hot end).  Add $40 for US shipping or $70 for international shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

Electronics Kit: Includes Ramps 1.4, Arduino Mega, stepper drivers, SD card, power supply, 4 stepper motors, endstops, LCD screen, rocker switch, plug and cable, wiring.  Add $15 for US shipping or $50 for international shipping.California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL & EARLY DELIVERY KOSSEL CLEAR PLA KIT- Complete Kossel Clear PLA Kit! Includes everything you need to build your own Kossel Clear delta printer. To add upgrades and/or extra items to your reward, please add the appropriate amounts based on the Rewards and Upgrade Options tables (Tables 2 & 3). Add $50 for US shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

KOSSEL CLEAR PLA KIT (BATCH 1) - Complete Kossel Clear PLA Kit! Includes everything you need to build your own Kossel Clear delta printer. To add upgrades and/or extra items to your reward, please add the appropriate amounts based on the Rewards and Upgrade Options tables (Tables 2 & 3). Add $50 for US shipping or $120 for international shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

KOSSEL CLEAR PLA KIT (BATCH 2) - Complete Kossel Clear PLA Kit! Includes everything you need to build your own Kossel Clear delta printer. To add upgrades and/or extra items to your reward, please add the appropriate amounts based on the Rewards and Upgrade Options tables (Tables 2 & 3). Add $50 for US shipping or $120 for international shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL & EARLY DELIVERY KOSSEL CLEAR ABS KIT - Complete Kossel Clear Kit with Heatbed! Includes everything you need to build your own Kossel Clear delta printer, and comes with an upgraded power supply, PCB heat bed, and borosilicate glass which allow you to print with both PLA and ABS material. To add upgrades and/or extra items to your reward, please add the appropriate amounts based on the Rewards and Upgrade Options tables (Tables 2 & 3). Add $50 for US shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

KOSSEL CLEAR ABS KIT (BATCH 1) - Complete Kossel Clear Kit with Heatbed! To add upgrades and/or extra items to your reward, please add the appropriate amounts based on the Rewards and Upgrade Options tables (Tables 2 & 3). Add $50 for US shipping or $120 for international shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

KOSSEL CLEAR ABS KIT (BATCH 2) - Complete Kossel Clear Kit with Heatbed! To add upgrades and/or extra items to your reward, please add the appropriate amounts based on the Rewards and Upgrade Options tables (Tables 2 & 3). Add $50 for US shipping or $120 for international shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.

To add upgrades and/or extra items to your reward, please add the appropriate amounts based on the Rewards and Upgrade Options tables (Tables 2 & 3). Add $100 for US domestic shipping or $145 for international shipping. California residents please add 8% to your pledge to cover sales tax.
